author: Staff report
title: Greetings From: China
text: Posted Jul. 19, 2015 at 9:15 AM By Staff report Posted Jul. 19, 2015 at 9:15 AM Holland, Mich. Jim and Carol Winslow and Pete and Raelene Koppenaal flew to Shanghai, China for a cruise on the Yangze River. They traveled with Koppenaal's son, David, who was on a business trip. The couples toured Shangai before their cruise. On their cruise, they toured three gorges and visited a temple and a dam on the upper Yangze. They then flew to Xian to see the Terra Cotta Army, and then flew to Bejing to see The Great Wall and Tienamen Square and the Forbidden City. Send us your travel photos Send your scenic travel photo to lori.timmer@hollandsentinel.com or 54 W. Eighth St., Holland, MI 49423. Include information about your trip, as well as a contact number.
